figura.config.action_wheel_title_pos.too: The position of the Title of the Action Wheel
figura.config.action_wheel_execute_on_cl: Executes the selected action when closing the Action Wheel, otherwise actions only run on mouse click
figura.config.new_action_wheel.tooltip: Changes the Action Wheel to a newer implementation of it
figura.config.use_local_server.tooltip: Toggles between using a local server or the main online server for online models
